resources.string: Cortado is a quick settings tile that allows you to prevent your screen from dimming.

Swipe from the top of your screen to access your quick settings tiles.

To add Cortado, edit your quick settings tiles, and look for the * icon. Drag it into your quick settings tiles!

Once your tile is added, you can change settings here.
When Cortado is enabled, set my dim timeout to
When I disable Cortado, set my dim timeout to
